task.summary: Default task
Add delete beer option to edit window
Adjusting GridBagLayout in edit beer
Adjusted gridbaglayout in edit beer - fixed default close operation
Adjusting GridBagLayout in edit bottled beer
Bugfixes to bottled beer creator/editor
Draft beers now sort into columns - edits to css layout
Sort draft beers by abv - getAbd --> getAbvString - added getAbvDouble - added draftAbvSorter
Sort draft beers by abv (cont.) - modified printList to sort array for each category
Improved column sorting - sorts based on the size of each column
CSS formatting
More CSS formatting
Moved xml & html files/folders to users home dir
fixes file associations in printlist()
fixes more file associations in printlist()

Commit...not sure what. Stuff is broken. - text filter search will select the row from the unfiltered list. this is true in draft and bottles beer changers. - need inproved formatting for printlist - need improved printing of website
Fixed textfilter sort.
JLists in createDraftBeer are now single selection - also added sorting to current beer list
In createDraftBeer, only a one column can be selected at a time
More Fixing filepaths - headers and footer txt files are in user dir. (Picco App folder)
Star transition to JMenubar layout with diffent panels
Removed Menubar
BeerChanger is now MenuChanger
Worried about system crash
Basic gridBagLayout for new interface
Created ultimate Sigleton. Will revise in the future. - added draftBeerJPanel
More layout adjustments - edit button now works for both columns
Began removing static everyting - filepaths moved out of fileSetup - started ne draftBeerList class that will perform repetitive functions
More organizing. App Broken right now.
V0.2 - Size added to bottled list - sixes for bottled and draft beer now normal font weight
Spacing and () fixed on bottled beer list
clarified entry of bottled beer sizes. - beer should be entered in oz
removed space between number and oz in bottled list

More Static removed, variables declared final

Delete button on editBeer now working
